name: Disgraced (itch)
description:
WIP

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Jump - 'X' or 'Space'

Attack - 'Z' or 'Right Click'

Controller supported!

Little more than a proof of concept at current stage. Feedback greatly appreciated!

Planning on expanding to full game complete with equipment and boss battles. Will hopefully expand on the speed aspect, emphasizing fast completion of levels.

Thanks for checking it out, and have fun!
